title: Victim identified in Saturday morning LaSalle shooting
content:
The Weld County Coroner’s office today released the name of the man who died in shooting early Saturday in LaSalle.
Raymond Figueroa, 23, died after being shot by a 17-year-old boy just after 1 a.m. in a residence about six miles southeast of LaSalle. The person who called 911 told dispatchers he accidentally shot his friend while handling a gun.
Weld County Sheriff’s deputies arrested the boy on suspicion of negligent homicide. His name was not released because he is a juvenile.
A news release from the Weld County Sheriff’s office said Figueroa was a common guest in the house where the shooting happened. The same release said he was declared dead on scene.
